sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RHŒADEÆ (rhaeas, Linnaeus’s name, after Di-oſcorides, for the red poppy ), the name of the 27th order in Linnaeus’s fragments of a natural method, conſiſting of poppy and a few genera which reſemble it in habit and ſtructure. See Botany, p. 462.
